description:
Marie saves Lloyd from a terrible fate by stopping the fight between him and Allan, and reveals her true identity to Chrome. Marie and Chrome decide to execute Marie`s plan to stop the kingdom from going to war.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Suppose Someone Told You They`d Do Anything for You, Which You Appreciate but You Know You Should Push Back?
Tatoeba "Nandemo Shimasu!" to Iwarerya Warui Ki wa Shinai kedo Soko wa Damette Iwanakya Ikenai You na Dilemma
たとえば「なんでもします!」と言われりゃ悪い気はしないけどそこはダメって言わなきゃいけないようなジレンマ
